attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY DOES THIS GOVERMENT IN THESE TROUBLED TIMES ONLY PAY 5 PENCE IN EVERY POUND SPENT ON DEFENCE AND YET IT CAN PAY 37PENCE OF EVERY POUND IT SPENDS ON ASYLUM SEEKERS,WE HAVE BRITISH PEOPLE GOING TO FIGHT THE PRIME MINISTERS WARS AND YET HIS GOVERMENT WILL NOT GIVE THEM THE BEST THEY HAVE TO PURCHASE THE BEST THEMSELVES FROM THE USA,IF THEY ARE WOUNDED THEN INSTEAD OF A FORCES HOSPITAL THEY ARE PUSHED INTO NHS HOSPITALS AND ABUSED FOR BEING IN THE MILITERY

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name. Also, please do not use BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
